009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.geometric;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.isZero;
012import static java.lang.Math.hypot;
013import static org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory.evaluationChecker;
014
015import java.util.LinkedList;
016import java.util.List;
017
018import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresFactory;
019import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresOptimizer;
020import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresOptimizer.Optimum;
021import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LeastSquaresProblem;
022import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer;
023import org.apache.commons.math3.fitting.leastsquares.MultivariateJacobianFunction;
024import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.Array2DRowRealMatrix;
025import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.ArrayRealVector;
026import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
027import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector;
028import org.apache.commons.math3.optim.SimpleVectorValueChecker;
029import org.apache.commons.math3.util.Pair;
030
031import ij.IJ;
032import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
033import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
034import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitPratt;
035import imagingbook.common.math.PrintPrecision;
036
037/**
038 * "Distance-based" geometric circle fitter using a
039 * Levenberg-Marquart optimizer.
040 * 
041 * @author WB
042 *
043 */
044public class CircleFitGeometricDist extends CircleFitGeometric {
045        
046        private final Pnt2d[] pts;
047        private final double[] V;
048        private final double[][] J;
049        private final Optimum solution;
050        private final List<double[]> history = new LinkedList<>();
051        
052        public CircleFitGeometricDist(Pnt2d[] pts, GeometricCircle initCircle) {
053                this(pts, initCircle, DefaultMaxIterations, DefaultMaxIterations, DefaultTolerance);
054        }
055        
056        public CircleFitGeometricDist(Pnt2d[] pts, GeometricCircle initCircle, int maxEvaluations, int maxIterations, double tolerance) {
057                this.pts = pts;
058                this.V = new double[pts.length];
059                this.J = new double[pts.length][3];
060                
061                LeastSquaresProblem problem = 
062                                LeastSquaresFactory.create(
063                                        new AnalyticModel(), // model(V, J), 
064                                        new ArrayRealVector(pts.length),                // zero vector
065                                        new ArrayRealVector(initCircle.getParameters()),
066                                        evaluationChecker(new SimpleVectorValueChecker(tolerance, tolerance)),
067                                        maxEvaluations, maxIterations);
068                
069                LeastSquaresOptimizer optimizer = new LevenbergMarquardtOptimizer();    // new GaussNewtonOptimizer();  
070                this.solution = optimizer.optimize(problem);
071        }
072        
073
074        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
075
076        @Override
077        public double[] getParameters() {
078                return solution.getPoint().toArray();
079        }
080        
081        @Override
082        public int getIterations() {
083                return solution.getIterations();
084        }
085        
086        @Override
087        public List<double[]> getHistory() {
088                return history;
089        }
090        
091        // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
092    
093    /**
094     * Defines function {@link #value(RealVector)} which returns
095     * the vector of model values and the associated Jacobian matrix
096     * for a given parameter point.
097     */
098    class AnalyticModel implements MultivariateJacobianFunction {
099
100                @Override
101                public Pair<RealVector, RealMatrix> value(RealVector point) {
102                        final double[] p = point.toArray();
103                        if (RecordHistory) {
104                                history.add(p.clone());
105                        }
106                        
107                        final double xc = p[0], yc = p[1], r  = p[2];
108                        for (int i = 0; i < pts.length; i++) {
109                                double dx = xc - pts[i].getX();
110                                double dy = yc - pts[i].getY();
111                                double ri = hypot(dx, dy);
112                                
113                                // values:
114                                V[i] = ri - r;
115                                
116                                // Jacobian:
117                                if (isZero(ri)) {       // (xi,yi) is at the circle center
118                                        J[i][0] = 0;    // (xc - xi) = 0 too
119                                        J[i][1] = 0;    // (yc - yi) = 0 too
120                                } else {
121                                        J[i][0] = dx / ri;
122                                        J[i][1] = dy / ri;
123                                }
124                                J[i][2] = -1;
125                        }
126                        RealVector VV = new ArrayRealVector(V, false);
127                        RealMatrix JJ = new Array2DRowRealMatrix(J, false);
128                        return new Pair<>(VV, JJ);
129                }
130        
131    }
132    
133    
134    
135    // -------------------------------------------------------------------
136    
137    public static void main(String[] args) {
138        PrintPrecision.set(9);
139        //Pnt2d[] points = CircleMaker.makeTestCircle(XC, YC, R, 100, Angle0, Angle1, SigmaNoise);
140        //Pnt2d[] points = CircleMaker.makeTestCircle(XC, YC, R, 4, Angle0, Angle1, 0.1);
141        //Pnt2d[] points = CircleMaker.makeTestGander(30);
142        //Pnt2d[] points = CircleSampler.make3Points(30);
143        
144        Pnt2d[] points = {
145                                Pnt2d.from(15,9),
146                                Pnt2d.from(68,33),
147                                Pnt2d.from(35,69),
148                                Pnt2d.from(17,51),
149                                Pnt2d.from(90,54)
150                };
151                
152//      Circle2D real = new Circle2D(XC, YC, R);
153//      IJ.log(" real: " + real.toString());
154        
155//      Pnt2d[] points = makeTestPoints();
156                
157                GeometricCircle estimA = new CircleFitPratt(points).getGeometricCircle();
158                IJ.log("estimA: " + estimA.toString());
159                IJ.log("estimA error = " + estimA.getMeanSquareError(points));
160                
161                //Circle2D init = new Circle2D(XC, YC, R);
162                //Circle2D init = estimA;
163                GeometricCircle init = disturbCircle(estimA, -1.5, 0.5, 10);
164                IJ.log(" init: " + init.toString());
165                IJ.log(" init error = " + init.getMeanSquareError(points));
166                
167                CircleFitGeometricDist geomfitter = new CircleFitGeometricDist(points, init);
168                GeometricCircle refined = geomfitter.getCircle();
169                
170                //Circle2D refined = Doube.levenMarqFull(points, init);
171                
172                IJ.log("refin: " + refined.toString());
173                IJ.log("iterations: " + geomfitter.getIterations());
174                
175                IJ.log("final error = " + refined.getMeanSquareError(points));
176    }
177
178    private static GeometricCircle disturbCircle (GeometricCircle circle, double dxc, double dyc, double dr) {
179                return new GeometricCircle(circle.getXc() + dxc, circle.getYc() + dyc, circle.getR() + dr);
180        }
181}
